words.def: the branch of philosophy that analyzes inference
a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops
the scene of any event or action (especially the place of a meeting)
a subordinate who performs an important but routine function
a segment of the trunk of a tree when stripped of branches
a slippery or viscous liquid or liquefiable substance not miscible with water
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
